rules.description: Cmd+Right arrow -> Option+cmd arrow (to allow for window snapping because end/home already mapps to cmd+arrow)
shift+fn toggles touchbar mode between 'fullControlStrip', 'appWithControlStrip' and 'functionKeys'

to.shell_command: if [[ $(defaults read com.apple.touchbar.agent PresentationModeGlobal) == 'functionKeys' ]]; then defaults write com.apple.touchbar.agent PresentationModeGlobal 'appWithControlStrip'; else defaults write com.apple.touchbar.agent PresentationModeGlobal 'functionKeys'; fi && pkill ControlStrip

rules.description: left_commmand+enter - left_alt+enter (for auto suggestions in IDE)
left_option+` to left_command+` - To switch window of same application (uses non_us_backlash due to remap of that key to grave_accent_and_tilde in normal modifications)
left_gui+v to left_option+v to open clipboard history
Left alt + spacebar -> Left command + spacebar
Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut)
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
Shift+End => Cmd+Shift+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line with selection)
Shift+Home => Cmd+Shift+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with selection)
End => Cmd+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line)
Home => Cmd+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line)
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
(Added for Terminal) Ctrl+Shift+C, Ctrl+Shift+V => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste)
Map Rectangular Screenshot (copy to clipboard) to Alt/Option+Shift+s
Disable command+q app quitting - remap to left_option-q so you can still use it in Rider for closing all other tabs)
Open a terminal window with Ctrl-RAlt-T
Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut)
Ctrl+L => Cmd+L (Open url location) (Only in browsers)
Ctrl+(Shift)+Right/left arrow => Alt+(Shift)+Right/left arrow (Move cursor one word with selection and without selection)
Ctrl+Up/down arrow => Up/down arrow (Move cursor up/down)
Ctrl+Left Click => Cmd+Left Click (select multiple items)
